sentence.Network_en: Seethe fireinthe sky, wefeelthe beating of our hearts together.

Lovers and mad men have such seething brains ., 情侣和疯子才会有这样狂热的心境.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sēothan make or keep boiling, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch zieden

entry.def: When you are seething, you are very angry about something but do not express your feelings about it.

example.ex: She took it calmly at first but under the surface was seething...
example.tran: 她起初平静地接受了，但内心却气呼呼的。

example.ex: She grinned derisively while I seethed with rage...
example.tran: 我怒火中烧，她却嘲弄地咧着嘴笑。

entry.tran: 充满，遍布，到处都是(人或物)
entry.def: If you say that a place is seething with people or things, you are emphasizing that it is very full of them and that they are all moving about.

example.ex: The forest below him seethed and teemed with life...
example.tran: 他下面的森林里处处生机勃勃。

example.ex: Madrigueras station was a seething mass of soldiers.
example.tran: 马德里古埃拉斯车站到处都是士兵。

means.word_mean: 2. be in an agitated emotional state;

auth_sentence.content: Never...leave cabbage to seethe for long.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Never...leave cabbage to seethe for long.

auth_sentence.content: In the dark, I seethe with rage, briefly, silently, pointlessly all those decades wasted fighting a particular mindset.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the dark, I seethe with rage, briefly, silently, pointlessly all those decades wasted fighting a particular mindset.

auth_sentence.content: However illicit the acquisition of those volumes, it reminds you that Rimbaud's restless intellect continued to seethe.

means.word_mean: 强压怒火; 生闷气(~with sth|~ at sth)

sentences.en: She seethed silently in the corner.
sentences.cn: 她在角落里默默地生闷气。

sentences.en: He marched off, seething with frustration.
sentences.cn: 他大为失望，气呼呼地走开了。

means.word_mean: (地方)充满; 遍布; 到处都是(人、动物）（~with sth)

sentences.en: The resort is seething with tourists all year round.
sentences.cn: 这处名胜一年四季游人如织。

means.word_mean: (液体)翻滚; 翻腾; 涌动

sentences.en: The grey ocean seethed beneath them.
sentences.cn: 灰蒙蒙的大海在他们下面翻滚。

jushi.english: He seethed with rage as the train left without him.
The waves seethed around the rocks.
